mdRecord.dcterms:description: There are three pages. The first is a photocopy of a typed page which seems to be an introduction to "Plan for the Building" for the Lexington Old Folks Home and Orphanage. The second is a photocopy of a typed page containing The Orphans' Plea in the form of a poem. The third is a photocopy of a typed page listing the Officers and Directors for (presumably) the Lexington Old Folks Home and Orphanage.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Old Folks Home and Orphanage Plans
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: African Americans
Orphanages
Rest homes
Virginia -- Lexington
Twentieth century
